verses.text: Likewise this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

In the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where they \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* shall they \w kill|strong="H7819"\w* the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof shall he \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* of it all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* thereof; the \w rump|strong="H0451"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*,

And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add is\add* on them, which \add is\add* by the \w flanks|strong="H3689"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add that is\add* above the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, with the \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, it shall he take \w away|strong="H5493"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* them upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add for\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it \add is\add* a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*.

Every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* among the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof: it shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: it \add is\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

As the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \add is\add*, so \add is\add* the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: \add there is\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* for them: the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that maketh \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* therewith shall have \add it\add*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* any \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, \add even\add* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall have to himself the \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* which he hath \w offered|strong="H7126"\w*.

And all the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* that is \w baken|strong="H0644"\w* in the \w oven|strong="H8574"\w*, and all that is \w dressed|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w fryingpan|strong="H4802"\w*, and in the \w pan|strong="H4227"\w*, shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* it.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft in the pan: or, on the flat plate or, slice\f*

And every meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w dry|strong="H2720"\w*, shall all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* have, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \add as much\add* as \w another|strong="H0251"\w*.

And this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, which he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

If he \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it for a \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, then he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* with the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, \w fried|strong="H7246"\w*.

Besides the \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w*, he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \add for\add* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And of it he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* out of the whole \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* \add for\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* it shall be the \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w* that \w sprinkleth|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* for \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that it is \w offered|strong="H7133"\w*; he shall not \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* any of it until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

But if the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \add be\add* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, or a voluntary \w offering|strong="H5071"\w*, it shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* his \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*: and on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* also the \w remainder|strong="H3498"\w* of it shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*:

But the \w remainder|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And if \add any\add* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* at \w all|strong="H0398"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, it shall not be \w accepted|strong="H7521"\w*, neither shall it be \w imputed|strong="H2803"\w* unto him that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* it: it shall be an \w abomination|strong="H6292"\w*, and the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* of it shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

And the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* that \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* any \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add thing\add* shall not be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*; it shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and as for the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, all that be \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof.

But the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, that \add pertain\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, having his \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* upon him, even that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Moreover the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that shall \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* any \w unclean|strong="H2932"\w* \add thing, as\add* the \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, or \add any\add* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, or any \w abominable|strong="H8263"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \add thing\add*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, which \add pertain\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, even that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no manner of \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, of \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, or of \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, or of \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*.

And the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the beast that dieth of \w itself|strong="H5038"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of that which is torn with \w beasts|strong="H2966"\w*, may be \w used|strong="H6213"\w* in any other \w use|strong="H4399"\w*: but ye shall in no \w wise|strong="H0398"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of it.\f + \fr 7.24 \ft beast…: Heb. carcase\f*

For whosoever \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, of which men \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, even the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* \add it\add* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Moreover ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no manner of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \add whether it be\add* of \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w* or of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, in any of your \w dwellings|strong="H4186"\w*.

Whatsoever \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add it be\add* that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* any \w manner|strong="H3605"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, even that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, He that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* his \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

His own \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* with the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w*, it shall he \w bring|strong="H0935"\w*, that the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* may be \w waved|strong="H5130"\w* \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: but the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* shall be \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* shall ye \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \add for\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of your peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

He among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, that \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, shall have the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* for \add his\add* \w part|strong="H4490"\w*.

For the \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* and the \w heave|strong="H8641"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* have I \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from off the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of their peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* and unto his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* by a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* from among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ This \add is the portion\add* of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, out of the \w offerings|strong="H0801"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add when\add* he \w presented|strong="H7126"\w* them to minister unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*;

Which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* them, \add by\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout their \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, of the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and of the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and of the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*, and of the \w consecrations|strong="H4394"\w*, and of the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*;

Which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* their \w oblations|strong="H7133"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.
